parameters.name: kind
parameters.description: Comma-separated list of activity kinds. Acceptable values are "create" and "transfer". If not specified, defaults to "create,transfer".

get.description: Get activities. Can be filtered by collectionSymbol, kind, tokenId, ownerAddress. By default, sort by createdAt desc

get.summary: Get all activities, not dependent on collection
get.description: Get activities. Optional cursor and limit parameters
Get tokens, can be filtered by collectionSymbol, owner, tokenIds

parameters.name: showAll
parameters.description: Show all items including the listed and unlisted ones

get.description: Get Rare Sats Listings by a Variety of Filters and Sorting Orders

parameters.name: satributes
parameters.description: Filter listings that have the given satributes in the same sat range

parameters.name: minListedAt
parameters.description: Filter items that were listed after the given timestamp

parameters.name: maxListedAt
parameters.description: Filter items that were listed before the given timestamp

parameters.name: minPrice
parameters.description: Filter by minimum listed price in satoshis

parameters.name: maxPrice
parameters.description: Filter by maximum listed price in satoshis

parameters.name: minUtxoSize
parameters.description: Filter by minimum utxo size in satoshis

parameters.name: maxUtxoSize
parameters.description: Filter by maximum utxo size in satoshis

parameters.name: minSatRange
parameters.description: Filter by minimum sat range in sats

parameters.name: maxSatRange
parameters.description: Filter by maximum sat range in sats

parameters.name: minBlockNumber
parameters.description: Filter listings that only contain sats that were created after the given block number

parameters.name: maxBlockNumber
parameters.description: Filter listings that only contain sats that were created before the given block number

parameters.name: minBlockTimestamp
parameters.description: Filter listings that only contain sats that were created after the given timestamp

parameters.name: maxBlockTimestamp
parameters.description: Filter listings that only contain sats that were created before the given timestamp

parameters.name: listed
parameters.description: Get only the rare sats that are listed if set to true

parameters.name: offset
parameters.description: Offset - the `nextOffset` cursor received from the request of the previous page

post.description: Get Rare Sats Batch Listing PSBT for Signing

requestBody.description: Rare Sats Batch Listing PSBT Post Request Body

sellerReceiveAddress.description: Default to the utxo owner address if not specified

unsignedCombinedPSBTBase64.description: The PSBT to be signed by the owner of the rare sats

post.description: Submit Batch Listing using the signed PSBT received from `GET /listing-psbt`

requestBody.description: Rare Sats Batch Listing Post Request Body

price.description: The total price of the listed rare sats utxo. Must be equal to the sum of the price of each sat range

signedCombinedPSBTBase64.description: The selling PSBT must be signed by the rare sats owner. The unsigned PSBT can be generated using the `POST /listing-psbt` endpoint

post.summary: Get an unsigned PSBT for creating a rune sell order
post.description: Get an unsigned PSBT for creating a rune sell order

requestBody.description: PSBT Post Request Body for creating a rune sell order

rune.description: Rune symbol must contain only uppercase letters and be between 1 and 26 characters long.

makerRunesPublicKey.description: Bitcoin public key, either a standard or x-only format.

makerRunesAddress.description: Bitcoin address, supporting native segwit, Taproot, or P2SH formats.

makerReceiveAddress.description: Bitcoin receive address for the transaction, supporting native segwit, Taproot, or P2SH formats.

priceSats.description: Price in satoshis, within specified limits.

expiresAt.description: Expiration date and time of the order.

orderPsbtBase64.description: Base64-encoded unsigned PSBT (Partially Signed Bitcoin Transaction) of the sell order.

post.summary: Submit a signed PSBT for creating a rune sell order
post.description: Submit a signed PSBT for creating a rune sell order

requestBody.description: PSBT Post Request Body for creating a rune sell order

signedPsbtBase64.description: Base64-encoded signed PSBT (Partially Signed Bitcoin Transaction).

symbol.description: Symbol representing the asset being transacted.

makerRunesPublicKey.description: Maker's Bitcoin public key, either a standard or x-only format.

makerRunesAddress.description: Maker's Bitcoin address, supporting native segwit, Taproot, or P2SH formats.

makerReceiveAddress.description: Maker's Bitcoin receive address for the transaction, supporting native segwit, Taproot, or P2SH formats.

expiresAt.description: Expiration date and time for the order.

orderIds.description: Array of UUIDs for successfully created orders.

post.summary: Get an unsigned message for cancelling a rune sell order
post.description: Get an unsigned message for cancelling a rune sell order

requestBody.description: Post Request Body for cancelling a rune sell order

orderIds.description: Array of UUIDs of the orders to be cancelled; cannot be empty and maximum of 20.

makerAddress.description: Maker's Bitcoin address, supporting native segwit, Taproot, or P2SH formats.

makerPublicKey.description: Maker's Bitcoin public key, either a standard or x-only format.

orderIds.description: Array of UUIDs for successfully cancelled orders.

post.summary: Submit a signed message for cancelling a rune sell order
post.description: Submit a signed message for cancelling a rune sell order

requestBody.description: Post Request Body for cancelling a rune sell order

signature.description: A BIP322 signed version of the message requested from /v2/ord/btc/runes/psbt/order/cancel

orderIds.description: Array of UUIDs of the orders to be cancelled; cannot be empty and maximum of 20.

makerAddress.description: Maker's Bitcoin address, supporting native segwit, Taproot, or P2SH formats.

makerPublicKey.description: Maker's Bitcoin public key, either a standard or x-only format.

token.description: JWT token of cancellation request from /v2/ord/btc/runes/psbt/order/cancel.

orderIds.description: Array of UUIDs for successfully cancelled orders.

get.description: Get market market info for a specific rune

get.summary: Get orders for a specific rune
get.description: Get orders for a specific rune

parameters.name: rune
parameters.description: The rune symbol for which orders are requested.

parameters.name: side
parameters.description: Filter by order side, currently only 'sell' orders are supported.

parameters.name: sort
parameters.description: Sorting order of the results. Default is 'unitPriceAsc'.

parameters.name: offset
parameters.description: Pagination offset for the results. Default is 0, and increments of 100 are supported up to 2000.

parameters.name: includePending
parameters.description: Whether to include pending orders in the results. Default is false.

200.description: Successful response with an array of orders for the specified rune.

get.summary: Get rune utxos by wallet address
get.description: Get rune utxos by wallet address

parameters.name: address
parameters.description: The Bitcoin address to fetch Rune UTXOs for.

parameters.name: sort
parameters.description: Sorting order of the UTXOs based on their balance. Defaults to 'balanceAsc'.

parameters.name: includeListed
parameters.description: Whether to include UTXOs that are currently listed in the marketplace. Defaults to false.

200.description: Successful response with an array of UTXOs for the specified address.

get.summary: Get activities for a specific rune
get.description: Get activities for a specific rune

parameters.name: rune
parameters.description: The rune symbol for which activities are fetched.

parameters.name: offset
parameters.description: Pagination offset for the list of activities. Defaults to 0, increments must be multiples of 100, up to 10,000.

200.description: Successful response with an array of activity records for the specified rune.

get.summary: Get Rune activities for a specific wallet address
get.description: Get Rune activities for a specific wallet address

parameters.name: address
parameters.description: The wallet address to fetch Rune activities for.

parameters.name: offset
parameters.description: Pagination offset for the list of activities. Defaults to 0, increments must be multiples of 100, up to 10,000.

200.description: Successful response with an array of Rune activities for the specified wallet address.

get.summary: Get Rune balances by wallet address
get.description: Get Rune balances by wallet address

parameters.name: address
parameters.description: The wallet address to fetch Rune balances for.

parameters.name: rune
parameters.description: The specific Rune symbol whose balance is being queried.

200.description: Successful response with the balance details of the specified Rune for the given address.

balance.description: The raw balance of the Rune, typically in its smallest unit.

formattedBalance.description: The formatted balance of the Rune, adjusted for human readability according to divisibility.

ticker.description: The symbol of the Rune whose balance is represented.

parameters.name: window
parameters.description: Time window for which statistics are aggregated.

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: Limit the number of results returned. Default is 20, maximum is 2000.

parameters.name: sort
parameters.description: Column to sort the results by.

parameters.name: direction
parameters.description: Direction of the sort ('asc' for ascending, 'desc' for descending).

parameters.name: walletAddress
parameters.description: Filter results by a specific wallet address.

parameters.name: searchTerm
parameters.description: Filter collections by a search term.

parameters.name: allCollections
parameters.description: Include all collections in the results, regardless of activity.
